ai-ya8.2.3:1.1_0: whose mind is skillful, but no longer arise, and no more skillful will cease?’
ai-ya8.2.3:2.1_0: While the last mind of the unskillful, the skillful in its origin, their mind doesn’t arise, or if it’s already arisen it’s lost.
ai-ya8.2.3:3.1_0: Or else it can be summoned ...
ai-ya8.2.3:4.1_0: You don’t understand that the unskillful ceases.
ai-ya8.2.3:4.1_1: he doesn’t have any declared the mind.
ai-ya8.2.3:5.1_0: (These three discourses should all go forth.)
ai-ya8.2.3:6.1_0: The canonical text of the mind is finished.
